statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance';
SELECT id, cryptocurrency_name, exchange_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY cryptocurrency_name;
SELECT exchange_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY exchange_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, exchange_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY cryptocurrency_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT exchange_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY exchange_name ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000 AND timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT exchange_id, cryptocurrency_id, price, timestamp FROM CryptocurrencyPrices WHERE exchange_id = 1;
SELECT exchange_id, cryptocurrency_id, price FROM CryptocurrencyPrices ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT cryptocurrency_id, price FROM CryptocurrencyPrices WHERE exchange_id = 2 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Exchanges WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT exchange_name, website FROM Exchanges WHERE exchange_name LIKE 'Bit%';
SELECT * FROM CryptocurrencyPrices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT exchange_name, cryptocurrency_id FROM Exchanges WHERE location = 'USA'
SELECT exchange_name, website FROM Exchanges ORDER BY exchange_name
SELECT * FROM CryptocurrencyPrices WHERE exchange_id = 1 AND cryptocurrency_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT exchange_name, location, website FROM Exchanges WHERE website IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE symbol='BTC'
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM exchange_data
SELECT action, amount FROM investor_decisions WHERE decision_id=1
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT timestamp, symbol FROM cryptocurrency_prices
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE exchange_id = 1
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM exchange_data ORDER BY exchange_name DESC
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM exchange_data WHERE location = 'USA'
SELECT timestamp, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE symbol = 'BTC' AND price > 50000
SELECT decision_id, action, amount FROM investor_decisions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_exchange;
SELECT id, exchange_name FROM cryptocurrency_exchange ORDER BY exchange_name DESC;
SELECT symbol, name FROM cryptocurrency WHERE symbol = 'BTC';
SELECT * FROM price_data WHERE price > 1000 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT decision_description, timestamp FROM investment_decision WHERE cryptocurrency_id IN (SELECT id FROM cryptocurrency WHERE symbol = 'ETH');
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_exchange;
SELECT id, exchange_name FROM cryptocurrency_exchange ORDER BY exchange_location DESC;
SELECT symbol, name FROM cryptocurrency WHERE symbol='BTC';
SELECT p.price, c.name, e.exchange_name FROM price_data p JOIN cryptocurrency c ON p.cryptocurrency_id=c.id JOIN cryptocurrency_exchange e ON p.exchange_id=e.id WHERE p.price > 1000;
SELECT i.decision_description, c.name, i.timestamp FROM investment_decision i JOIN cryptocurrency c ON i.cryptocurrency_id=c.id ORDER BY i.timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE exchange_id = 1;
SELECT exchange_name, location FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_id = 2;
SELECT name, circulating_supply FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1000000000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, symbol, amount FROM investments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT exchange_name, location, website_url FROM exchanges WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY exchange_name DESC;
SELECT name, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap < 1000000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, symbol, amount, investment_date FROM investments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
